Articles.Content:
Hi all, with my current kerbals version and set of mods, I am unable to find any container or part that is capable of holding 'chemicals'.  I have accounted for storage capabilities of every other resource or material offered, but have had not luck finding something that can hold 'chemicals'

Does anybody know what I am missing here, partwise, or perhaps mod-wise?

My KSP version: 1.3.1

My mods:

KIS
CommunityCategoryKit
ModuleManager
KAS
EasyVesselSwitch
HullcamVDSContinued
FlexibleDocking

Chemicals are used with the MKS mod which is an Umbra Space Industries mod....

That mod should come with "Kontainers."

If you want non-USI containers to hold weird things like "Chemicals" then I would uninstall Interstellar Fuel Switch and Core....then go in and manually delete them if you used CKAN....because they still might be in there....lol.

Then install configurable containers....not just the core.

Then go back and install interstellar fuel switch core if you needed that as a dependancy for another mod....

Edited August 21, 2018 by JoE Smash
